verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu that came to Jeremiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am concerning all the people יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הָֽרְבִעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'It, in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> li-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> Hi, he הַשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nah year הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ית <S%H7224><s%> ha-Ri-sho-Nit, that [was] the first לִנְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> lin-vu-chad-retz-Tzar of Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel. of Babylon

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֜ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu The which Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am unto all the people יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶ֛ל <S%H413><s%> ve-'El and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei and to all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh that [is] the three עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year לְיֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> le-yo-shi-Ya-hu of Josiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אָמוֹן֩ <S%H526><s%> 'a-mOn of Amon מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וְעַ֣ד׀ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom even unto this day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, to this זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh these שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Losh three וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twentieth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah has come דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me וָאֲדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> va-'a-dab-Ber hath come unto me and I have spoken אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem to you אַשְׁכֵּ֥ים <S%H7925><s%> 'ash-Keim unto you rising early וְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-dab-Ber and speaking וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'-Tem. but ye have not hearkened

וְשָׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> ve-sha-Lach hath sent יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem about אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲבָדָ֧יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav unto you all his servants הַנְּבִאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> hash-Kem rising early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> ve-sha-Lo-ach and sending וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'-Tem; [them] but ye have not hearkened וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor הִטִּיתֶ֥ם <S%H5186><s%> hit-ti-Tem nor inclined אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָזְנְכֶ֖ם <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-ne-Chem your ear לִשְׁמֹֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a'. to hear

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, They said שֽׁוּבוּ־ <S%H7725><s%> shu-vu- Turn ye again נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> na now אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish now every one מִדַּרְכּ֤וֹ <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-Ko way הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah from his evil וּמֵרֹ֣עַ <S%H7455><s%> u-me-Ro-a' and from the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4611><s%> ma-'al-lei-Chem, of your doings וּשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> u-she-Vu and dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath given יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God לָכֶ֖ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Chem וְלַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> ve-la-'a-vo-tei-Chem; unto you and to your fathers לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> le-min- at עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam ever וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. and ever

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תֵּלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> te-le-Chu, go אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei not after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim, other לְעָבְדָ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> le-'a-ve-Dam to serve וּלְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <S%H7812><s%> u-le-hish-ta-cha-Vot them and to worship לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no תַכְעִ֤יסוּ <S%H3707><s%> tach-'I-su them and provoke me not to anger אוֹתִי֙ <S%H854><s%> o-Ti with בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Seh with the works יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Chem, of your hands וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no אָרַ֖ע <S%H7489><s%> 'a-Ra' and I will do you no hurt לָכֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> la-Chem.

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'-Tem Yet ye have not hearkened אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- unto me saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD לְמַ֧עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an order; הִכְעִסוּנִי hich-'i-su-ni כהַכְעִיסֵ֛נִי <S%H3707><s%> hach-'i-Se-ni be angry קבְּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Seh with the works יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Chem of your hands לְרַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> le-Ra' to your own hurt לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem. ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts יַ֕עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'-Tem Because ye have not heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבָרָֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai. my words

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold שֹׁלֵ֡חַ <S%H7971><s%> sho-Le-ach Behold I will send וְלָקַחְתִּי֩ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ti and take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מִשְׁפְּח֨וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot all the families צָפ֜וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon of the north נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar and Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king בָּבֶל֮ <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon עַבְדִּי֒ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di my servant וַהֲבִ֨אֹתִ֜ים <S%H935><s%> va-ha-Vi-'o-Tim and will bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz them against this land הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> haz-zoT likewise וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and against יֹ֣שְׁבֶ֔יהָ <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei-ha, and against the inhabitants וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim thereof and against all these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; round about וְהַ֣חֲרַמְתִּ֔ים <S%H2763><s%> ve-Ha-cha-ram-Tim, and will utterly destroy וְשַׂמְתִּים֙ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Tim them and make לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> le-sham-Mah them an astonishment וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֔ה <S%H8322><s%> ve-lish-re-Kah, and an hissing וּלְחָרְב֖וֹת <S%H2723><s%> u-le-cha-re-Vot desolations עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. and perpetual

וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֣י <S%H6><s%> ve-ha-'a-vad-Ti Moreover I will take מֵהֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem, them ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol from them the voice שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> sa-sOn of mirth וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and the voice שִׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah, of gladness ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice חָתָ֖ן <S%H2860><s%> cha-Tan of the bridegroom וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and the voice כַּלָּ֑ה <S%H3618><s%> kal-Lah; of the bride ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the sound רֵחַ֖יִם <S%H7347><s%> re-Cha-yim of the millstones וְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> ve-'or and the light נֵֽר׃ <S%H5216><s%> Ner. of the candle

וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whole הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz And this whole land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, will be a לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <S%H2723><s%> le-cha-re-Bah shall be a desolation לְשַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8047><s%> le-sham-Mah; [and] an astonishment וְעָ֨בְד֜וּ <S%H5647><s%> ve-'A-ve-Du shall serve הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim and these nations הָאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh and these אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִמְלֹ֣אות <S%H4390><s%> chim-Lot are accomplished שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im And it shall come to pass when seventy שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years אֶפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> 'ef-Kod [that] I will punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king בָּבֶל֩ <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and that הַגּ֨וֹי <S%H1471><s%> hag-Goy and that nation הַה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲוֹנָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nam for their iniquity וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz and the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> kas-Dim; of the Chaldeans וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti and will make אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To לְשִֽׁמְמ֥וֹת <S%H8077><s%> le-shim-Mot desolations עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. it perpetual
